title: Butternut squash soup with sage and sausage
ingredients: ['225g spicy sausage, casings removed', '8 fresh sage leaves', '450g butternut squash, peeled and chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '2 small carrots, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '4 tablespoons sherry', '700ml chicken stock', '250ml beef stock', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '4 tablespoons single cream', 'freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '4 teaspoons soured cream']
